Note: Stanzas separated by Latin prose; follows 171.
Subjects: churches, dedication of; sermons, verse in
_description: Four things used in blessing a church, and a comment on how these things are lacking in the author’s time — two quatrains (aabb) in a sermon (by Bromyard?) de dedicatione ecclesie

CULKk424.First Lines:
Holy water wel y-madSchyl song to mak men gladCrossis ypentyd
                    openlyand torches brennyng louely…
CULKk424.Last Lines:
…Owyr crossys byth y bleckedOuyr torchys ben y
                    fleckyd
